explanations.reason: The paper focuses on a national cross-sectional study of cardio-cerebral vascular disease (CCVD) among the Chinese elderly, investigating prevalence, risk factors, and disease management. The methods used include univariate and multivariate logistic proportional regression analyses, which are statistical techniques rather than machine learning or deep learning approaches. None of the provided keywords related to machine learning, neural networks, or other advanced computational methods are mentioned or implied in the title or abstract.
